name: Our Darker Purpose
summary: Journey to the dark heart of the Edgewood Home for Lost Children in this fiendishly difficult action RPG!When her teacher stepped out of the classroom a month ago, Cordy never imagined he would be gone for good. Now her fellow students have turned on each other as the school descends into chaos.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Roguelike
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2014年1月30日
